NetScour Security - the company

Mission

To build a next-generation platform for software security testing.

Vision

To provide quality tools and services for software security testing that will be affordable to everyone.

Security
NetScour Security considers user data sacred and will do everything in our power to protect it
Privacy
We will never give our customers' data away
Transparency
We believe in transparency as the primary driver of great relationships
Availability
We want to build and provide affordable software security testing tools and services to everyone that needs them
Community
We will always proactively support communication and collaboration both online and in-person
Equality
One thing that we will never tolerate is hatred, hate speeches, or any inequality-based degradation or humiliation. Be kind to each other. Period.
